ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Hamamelis Virginiana Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Limon Juice, Niacinamide, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Oleate, Xanthan Gum, Parfum, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ethoxydiglycol, Propylene Glycol, Glucose, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Butylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Caramel, Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Sodium Hydroxid.
